short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to stream your desktop into meetings with Jitsi Meet and Jitsi Videobridge within FSD

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to share the desktop or a window while using Jitsi-Videobridge in Foothills School Division. The frames per second refresh is set on the Jitsi-Videobridge server at a minimum of 5 and a maximum of 24 to allow users to stream video if needed to all particpants in a meeting room.
